name: Aim High for High School - Summer Enrichment Program
description: Aim High's mission is to create life-changing opportunities during the summer and beyond. Our community: NURTURES the promise and potential of middle school students from low-income neighborhoods. PREPARES students for high school, setting them on the path to college and future success. INSPIRES the next generation of teachers and educational leaders.
fullDescription: Aim High's mission is to create life-changing opportunities during the summer and beyond. Our community: NURTURES the promise and potential of middle school students from low-income neighborhoods. PREPARES students for high school, setting them on the path to college and future success. INSPIRES the next generation of teachers and educational leaders.
whatTheyOffer: Aim High is a five-week summer enrichment program for rising 6th â€“ 9th graders from low-income communities across the greater Bay Area. Offered at no cost to students and their families for up to four summers, Aim High helps middle schoolers build academic confidence, discover a love of learning, and develop the skills they need to thrive in high school and in life. Admitted students are expected to attend the full five-week program.
address: 2030 Harrison Street, 3rd floor, San Francisco , CA, 94110
